```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(r3js)
```

```{r plot_creation}
# Setup plot
data3js <- plot3js.new()

data3js <- plot3js.window(
  data3js,
  xlim   = c(0,10),
  ylim   = c(0,40),
  zlim   = c(0,1)
)

# Add a box
data3js <- box3js(data3js)

# Add an x axis label
data3js <- axis3js(
  data3js,
  side       = "x",
  cornerside = "l",
  at         = 0:10
)

# Show the plot
r3js(data3js)
```
